showcase.title: Showcased Bots
showcase.subtitle: Our Selection of Showcased Bots
showcase.description: Our selection of showcased bots, handpicked for their exceptional performance and reliability.

harmodify.description: Harmodify is a powerful music bot with seamless playback and high-quality sound. Ideal for gaming sessions or hangouts.

playdis.description: Playdis is a fun-packed game bot with engaging games and a built-in economy system. Ideal for friendly competition and rewards.

utilicore.description: UtiliCore is an all-in-one utility bot with features like stunning embeds and real-time notifications. Ideal for optimizing server management.

privateeyes.description: PrivateEyes is a versatile NSFW bot with features for mature communities and SFW content. Ideal for fun and relaxed servers.

ui_update.title: New UI Update
ui_update.description:
Website UI has been updated to a new design. We hope you like it!

We are also working on a Dashboard for the Disutils Team, which will be released soon. Stay tuned for more updates!
ui_update.author: RejectModders Owner/Developer @Disutils Team

translation_recruitment.title: Translation Team Recruitment
translation_recruitment.description:
We are looking for dedicated individuals to join our Translation Team. A personal page for the Translation Team will be created on the Disutils website to showcase your contributions.

If you are proficient in a language and interested in helping with translations, please contact RejectModders.
translation_recruitment.author: RejectModders Owner/Developer @Disutils Team

website_launch.title: Website Released!
website_launch.description: Hello everyone! We have worked really hard on this website to make it look really good, hopefully you like it and if you see any issues, please report it to us!
website_launch.author: RejectModders Owner/Developer @Disutils Team

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions
meta.description: Find answers to commonly asked questions about Disutils Team, our bots, and our services.

questions.question: What is Disutils Team?
questions.answer: A dedicated group of individuals committed to enhancing and simplifying the Discord experience for all users.

questions.question: How can I join the Disutils Team?
questions.answer: You can apply to join the Disutils Team by visiting our application page.

questions.question: Are the bots free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, all our bots are free to use. However, we offer premium features for those who want to support us.

questions.question: How do I invite a bot to my server?
questions.answer: Click the Invite Our Bots link and follow the instructions.

questions.question: Where can I find the documentation for the bots?
questions.answer: You can find the documentation on the Documentation page or the Bots page.

questions.question: How can I get support?
questions.answer: Join our Discord server or email us at support@disutils.com.

questions.question: What should I do if I find a bug?
questions.answer: Use the bot's bug report command, report it on our Discord, or email us.

questions.question: Can I contribute to the development of the bots?
questions.answer: Yes! See our GitHub page.

questions.question: Do you offer custom bot development?
questions.answer: Yes. Contact us through our contact page.

questions.question: How can I stay updated with the latest news?
questions.answer: Follow our news page or join our Discord server.

meta.title: Pricing
meta.description: Explore our Discord bot development and hosting pricing options to find the perfect package for your needs.

header.title: Pick your perfect Discord bot package

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our Discord bot development services.

questions.question: Do I need to host the bot myself?
questions.answer: No, our packages include hosting for the first month. After that, you can opt for our monthly hosting plan or self-host.

questions.question: Can I request custom features?
questions.answer: Yes! Each plan allows for custom commands, and we're happy to discuss additional custom features for an additional fee.

questions.question: How long does it take to develop my bot?
questions.answer: Basic bots typically take 3-5 days, Advanced bots 7-10 days, and Premium bots 14-21 days depending on complexity.

questions.question: Do you offer ongoing support?
questions.answer: We provide free bug fixes for 30 days. Beyond that, we offer affordable monthly maintenance plans.

help_box.title: Have a different question?
help_box.text: Reach out to us directly for answers about our Discord bot services.

meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Our commitment to protecting your privacy and how we handle your data.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: At Disutils Team, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information. Throughout this document, "Our Bots" refers to the bots developed by the Disutils Team.

content.acceptance: Acceptance of Terms: By using Our Bots, you agree to this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any part of this policy, please refrain from using Our Bots.
content.modifications: Modifications to the Policy: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. It is your responsibility to review this policy regularly. Continued use of Our Bots after any changes indicates your acceptance of the revised policy.
content.scope: Scope of the Policy: This Privacy Policy applies to all interactions with Our Bots and does not cover any third-party services or websites that may be linked from Our Bots.

content.user_data: User Data: Our Bots collect and store user IDs and relevant messages solely for the purpose of executing their functions effectively.
content.feedback_data: Feedback Data: If you provide feedback regarding Our Bots, we may collect and utilize that feedback for their ongoing improvement and development. This data may include suggestions and comments.

content.command_execution: Command Execution: User data collected by Our Bots is used exclusively for executing their commands. We do not use this data for any other purpose.
content.feedback_usage: Feedback Usage: Feedback provided may be utilized to enhance the features and user experience of Our Bots. However, we do not disclose your personal information without your explicit consent.

content.data_protection: Data Protection: We implement reasonable measures to safeguard the data collected by Our Bots, but we cannot guarantee absolute security. We are not liable for any data breaches.

content.data_request: Data Request: You may request to view the data stored by Our Bots at any time by reaching out to our support team. Note: Data requests can only be made once every 30 days.
content.data_deletion: Data Deletion: You may request the deletion of any data stored by Our Bots at any time by contacting our support team. Note: Data deletion requests can only be made once every 30 days.

content.third_party: Third-Party Services: Our Bots do not sell, share, or disclose user data to third parties. The source code of Our Bots is also kept private and is not disclosed to anyone. We may use third-party services for hosting, storage, or support, but they are bound by their own privacy policies and security measures.

content.explicit_content: Explicit Content: Our Bots may provide access to explicit content intended solely for users of legal age in their jurisdiction who consent to view adult material.
content.user_acknowledgment: User Acknowledgment: By utilizing Our Bots' NSFW features, you acknowledge and agree that you are accessing explicit content at your own discretion. If you are underage or uncomfortable with explicit material, please refrain from using these features.

privacy.contact: For any inquiries regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@disutils.com.

meta.title: Terms of Service
meta.description: The rules and regulations governing the use of our Discord bots and services.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: At Disutils Team, we are committed to providing quality services. These Terms of Service outline the rules and regulations for using Our Bots. Throughout this document, "Our Bots" refers to the bots developed by the Disutils Team.

content.acceptance: Acceptance of Terms: By integrating Our Bots into your server, you acknowledge and accept these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please refrain from adding Our Bots.
content.modifications: Modifications to the Terms: We reserve the right to amend these Terms at any time. It is your responsibility to periodically review these Terms. Your continued use of Our Bots following any changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms.

content.compliance: Compliance: Users are required to comply with all applicable laws and regulations while using Our Bots.
content.conduct: Conduct: You agree not to use Our Bots for any unlawful or prohibited activities, including but not limited to harassment, spamming, or any form of abuse.

content.feedback: Feedback: We welcome your feedback and suggestions for enhancing Our Bots. By providing your insights, you grant us permission to incorporate them into ongoing improvements.
content.support: Support: We will make reasonable efforts to provide technical support for Our Bots. However, we do not guarantee uninterrupted service and reserve the right to terminate Our Bots' services at any time without prior notice.

content.user: Termination by User: You may remove Our Bots from your server at any time, at your discretion.
content.us: Termination by Us: We reserve the right to terminate Our Bots' services at our discretion, without notice or explanation.

content.no_warranty: No Warranty: Our Bots are provided on an "as is" basis, without warranties or guarantees of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant the accuracy, reliability, or availability of Our Bots' services.

content.liability: Liability: In no event shall the creators or affiliates of Our Bots be liable for any direct, indirect, special, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use Our Bots.

terms.contact: For any inquiries regarding our Terms of Service, please contact us at support@disutils.com.

meta.description: This page is under construction and will be available soon.

coming_soon.title: Coming soon!
coming_soon.thanks: Thank you for understanding and patience!

meta.title: Error
meta.description: An error has occurred while processing your request.

messages.bad_request: Bad Request! That was more confusing than a cat doing calculus. Try again, but maybe with fewer typos and more coffee.
messages.unauthorized: Unauthorized! Who goes there?! Only those with the sacred credentials may pass. Speak 'friend' and enter... or just log in properly.
messages.forbidden: Forbidden! You've stumbled into the forbidden zone. Legend says only the Chosen One may enter. Spoiler: it's not you.
messages.not_found: Not Found! This page has gone on vacation, left no forwarding address, and isn't answering texts. Try looking elsewhere before we file a missing page report.
messages.internal_server_error: Internal Server Error! The server just rage-quit. We're bribing it with snacks and compliments. Please stand by.
messages.unknown_error: Unknown Error! Something broke in a mysterious, dramatic way. Even our tech wizard is scratching his beard. Try again, or summon a goat for sacrifice. (Just kidding... mostly.)

actions.search_now: Why not try to search again? Search now
